ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Digest Number 257
ygData.msgSnippet: I discovered this last night.  What a lifesaver!  I was in the Alchemist room in Permafrost and constantly mezzing myself, not fun especially with the pulls we
ygData.messageBody:
I discovered this last night. What a lifesaver! I was in the Alchemist
room in Permafrost and constantly mezzing myself, not fun especially with
the pulls we were getting. I accidentally had my tank targetted and he
happened to be on the opposite side of the room. I used that the rest of
the night. :)

Ezrae Dreamstealer
Lvl 23 DE Enchantress
Brell Serilis


On Wed, 22 Mar 2000, Quentin Goldsmythe wrote:

.From: Quentin Goldsmythe <hifireview@...>
.
.Slick move fozzle. Also consider targetting a group
.member who you KNOW will be out of range. Ask a tank
.to stand at the other end of the room and then target
.the tank. mez won't hit them on regular servers.
.
.Q
.
.--- Fozzle Brainbender <fozzleb@...> wrote:
.> Another cheap way to get out of this is to cast a
.> low
.> level dot on your self, and then cast mez at will!
.> Your dot will wake you up in a sec or two, no sweat
.> =)
.>
.> -
.
